{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DHP-500AV |revision=A1 |asin=B004FJSSQK |newegg=N82E16833127353 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=Powerline Adapter |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=CEE 7/4 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7400 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8021 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1500;;1; |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|PowerLine AV 500 Adapter}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DHP-500AV}}
May be sold as the DHP-501AV Kit with two adapters.
